articles.title: The Last Of Us Part 2 Writers Have Discussed The Scenes And Ideas They Cut (SPOILERS) - GameSpot
articles.description: The Last of Us Part II is a long game with a lot of ideas--but it turns out that quite a few other aspects of the game were cut before release.
